column4: I have a defunct app stuck on my monitor that I cannot get rid of, anyone have ideas?
Alt-F2 type xkill - click the dead window
I killed the dead window but I can't reload the program.  Its webcamstudio
lol i was actually going to say that xkill isn't as good as kill - do you know the name of the process?  "ls aux | grep web" might tell you.
sorry re-reading my post to you -- it's ps not ls!!!
nothing really shows up, but ps aux shows 2 defunct process
use either "kill PID#" or "killall PROCESSNAME" of the defunct stuff
that doesn't work for defunct processes :(
logout / back in ?  probably the easiest
i've been looking for "webcam studio", are you sure you installed it from the repository?  what is it called?
if you are using Lucid then you need to add the partner repo
after installing libdvdread4 did you run the required script?
it came installed with Ubuntu, what should I run?
